attributes.action: Not introduce noise cut off devices in entertainment venues to control the level of entertainment music
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It has been brought to our attention that the government wish to make it legal requirement to have this device which cuts the power off if you play too loud. HOWEVER they don't work, they cut of when they shouldn't, they damage musical equipment and would ruin what little entertainment we have. PLEASE ENCOURAGE LIVE MUSIC!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
